description:
No error notifications are sent when VMs are re-scheduled.

However this can lead to NoValidHost errors being the the only notification for something that error-ed because of an error that happened three times or three different race conditions, or three different errors.

See _reschedule_or_error:
https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/compute/manager.py#L1104
title: should send error notifications on reschedule build failures
